div.div:
feat: add assetlinks.json for Chrome lookalike domain allowlist
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: add assetlinks.json for Chrome lookalike domain allowlist
- Add Digital Asset Links file to allowlist xn--jgy.tw and xn--uy0a.tw for Chrome lookalike warning suppression - Follows Chromium documentation for automated warning removal
https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/refs/heads/main/docs/security/lookalikes/lookalike-domains.md
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 55c67aecd3400d4a4a74db07c5caed07342eac71)

feat: Add "Editor's Note" shortcode component
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>
feat: add chat dialog box shortcode component

chore(config): update copyright to English name and email
- Update the copyright text to use the English name "Jim Chen" and an email address, replacing the Chinese name.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix(partials/articles): handle 0 pages term
- Update logic to handle term pages when setting pages, and default to an empty list if none are present.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 2813a238321e9bc20e5cb16b3849987e1104ffbe)

build(devcontainer): update Zola to 0.21.0-1 for dev setup
- Update the Zola installation in the devcontainer configuration to version 0.21.0-1.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 679b52f2206f393188f89d4280921f5e6abb661a)
feat: add assetlinks.json for Chrome lookalike domain allowlist

feat: add assetlinks.json for Chrome lookalike domain allowlist
- Add Digital Asset Links file to allowlist xn--jgy.tw and xn--uy0a.tw for Chrome lookalike warning suppression - Follows Chromium documentation for automated warning removal
https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/refs/heads/main/docs/security/lookalikes/lookalike-domains.md
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 55c67aecd3400d4a4a74db07c5caed07342eac71)
feat: add chat dialog box shortcode component
feat: add chat dialog box shortcode component (#2)

style(chat): replace speaker colors with hardcoded hex values
- Hardcoded color values have replaced CSS variables for speaker colors, assigning specific hex codes or "white" to each speaker type instead of using theme variables.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit cc92e4c336a7891227ad87cdf3e92a24c8205dc0)

feat(chat): add Felo Search speaker with custom SVG avatar
- Add a new SVG avatar image named felo.svg to the avatars directory. - Add support for a new speaker named Felo Search with a custom avatar and color in the chat template.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit d5c10dad764ca969117d21d6e19a6d554184c374)

feat: refresh and animate chat avatars for vibrant UI
- Replace the chat-avatar’s fixed shadows, borders, and object-fit with unset styles and attach a new infinite “chat-avatar-alive” pulsing animation - Remove the dark-theme box-shadow override for avatars - Add keyframes for chat-avatar-alive to scale avatars between 1 and 1.13 over 2.8s - Swap Jim’s avatar asset from SVG to JPG and update its template reference - Refresh several static avatar files (chatgpt, claude, copilot, gemini, and user) with new versions
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 97503d6b5357e9441d749457e81440ee57363ded)

docs(README): add usage and options for chat dialogue shortcode
- Add detailed documentation and usage examples for a new chat dialogue shortcode, including speaker options, avatars, and styling customization.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit b8cb22a961edbe574a8a03c861c5dcd68fe01f14)

style(chat): apply no-hover class to avatars for better UI
- Add the no-hover class to chat avatar images for improved styling or behavior.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit ff9296cfdb758dbae327311c8aa0de82019290bf)

style: refresh chat bubbles and unify avatar styling
- Change both left and right chat bubbles to use the new semi-transparent accent color (`accent-color-alpha`) and unified foreground text color - Add a subtle box shadow and `position: relative` to chat bubbles for depth - Remove all custom `code` and `pre` block styling inside chat bubbles - Reset and refine avatar styling, including a zero margin, consistent border, and drop shadow for circular avatars
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit ff813cfae1b1b66e42f150707d6dd047acbb0c74)

fix: parse chat shortcode body as markdown
Fix chat shortcode so the body content is correctly parsed as Markdown. According to Zola documentation, the body variable in shortcodes is plain text by default and must be filtered with the markdown filter to render markup.
Changes: - Add markdown filter to templates/shortcodes/chat.html - Ensure Markdown syntax (paragraphs, lists, code blocks, headings, links) is rendered as HTML - Remain compatible with trim and safe filters
Now chat content supports full Markdown formatting, including: - Paragraph separation - Unordered/ordered lists - Code blocks - Heading levels - Links and quotes
Tested: Verified correct HTML output via zola build --drafts and browser preview.
Resolves markdown parsing issue in chat shortcode
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 3b8ab65e4c4595243dd63f153600c3419abe28aa)

fix: resolve Tera template syntax error in chat shortcode
- Fix object literal syntax error in chat.html template by replacing with conditional statements compatible with Tera template engine - Rename demo.md to chat-demo.md to match issue requirements - Verify build success and chat shortcode functionality - All features working: speaker recognition, avatar display, styling
Resolves issue #1
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 9a3e59b1a4c7717ba8f1710ee74fd472b0ff17e2)

Implement chat shortcode with avatar support and styling
Co-authored-by: jim60105 <16995691+jim60105@users.noreply.github.com> (cherry picked from commit 23770d512a9e31458aeb0f286f7acdae652adcc5)

ci: update CI docs and submodule to ai-talks content
- Change GitHub Actions variable update instructions to reference ai-talks and ai-talks-content repositories instead of blog/blog-content - Bump content submodule commit from 817b908 to be50d36
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore: update static card image assets
- Update static card image assets in avif, png, and webp formats.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore: rebrand blog and refresh site description
- Rename the blog title from “琳聽 AI 漫談” to “琳聽智者漫談” across the Copilot instructions, config, stylesheet comment, and web manifest - Update the site description in config.toml to “AI 是不知疲倦的工作者，它們為了我的輕鬆而努力。”
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore: refresh site icons with tea emoji
- Change the site’s emoji favicon from
to
- Update all static icon assets (touch icon, favicons, and web manifest images)
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore(config): update site description to highlight AI diligence
- Update the site description to emphasize the diligence of AI entities and their effort to make users' lives easier.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix(partials/articles): handle 0 pages term
- Update logic to handle term pages when setting pages, and default to an empty list if none are present.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

build(devcontainer): update Zola to 0.21.0-1 for dev setup
- Update the Zola installation in the devcontainer configuration to version 0.21.0-1.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore: update branding and URLs to 聆.tw and ai-talks
- The README has been updated to rename the blog from 琳.tw to 聆.tw, update all associated URLs, references, badge links, and repository names from "blog" and "blog-content" to "ai-talks" and "ai-talks-content" accordingly.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

chore(submodule): update content source to ai-talks-content
- Update the content submodule URL to point to the ai-talks-content repository instead of blog-content.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: Add "Editor's Note" shortcode component
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>
feat: add chat dialog box shortcode component

chore(config): update copyright to English name and email
- Update the copyright text to use the English name "Jim Chen" and an email address, replacing the Chinese name.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix(partials/articles): handle 0 pages term
- Update logic to handle term pages when setting pages, and default to an empty list if none are present.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 2813a238321e9bc20e5cb16b3849987e1104ffbe)

build(devcontainer): update Zola to 0.21.0-1 for dev setup
- Update the Zola installation in the devcontainer configuration to version 0.21.0-1.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im> (cherry picked from commit 679b52f2206f393188f89d4280921f5e6abb661a)
